name: extract_text
description: Extract text content from a DOCX artifact. Use this tool when you need to read text from a Word document.

artifact_id.description: The unique identifier of the DOCX artifact to extract text from

text.description: The complete extracted text from the document
The extracted text from this paragraph

style.description: The style name of the paragraph (e.g., 'Normal', 'Heading 1')

paragraphs.description: Text extracted from each paragraph separately with style information

name: extract_tables
description: Extract tables from a DOCX artifact. Use this tool when you need to extract tabular data from a Word document.

artifact_id.description: The unique identifier of the DOCX artifact to extract tables from

format.description: Output format for table data. 'json' returns array of arrays, 'markdown' returns formatted markdown table.

table_index.description: The index of the table in the document (0-indexed)

data.description: The table data. Array of arrays for JSON format, markdown string for markdown format.
